text: Bale da'o-he manabakula, tomara yadi amara dbinera byapare sandihana haye thaka, tabe (jeno) ami tadera ebadata kari na yadera ebadata tomara kara allaha byatita. Kintu ami ebadata kari allaha taâ€™yalara, yini tule nena tomaderake. Ara amara prati nirdesa hayeche yate ami imanadaradera antarbhukta thaki.
